subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: The Bryan twins were stretched by Marcel Granollers and Marc López in a 6-3, 3-6, 7-5, 7-5 victory in Davis Cup play Saturday in Gijón, Spain.
snippet: The Bryan twins were stretched by Marcel Granollers and Marc López in a 6-3, 3-6, 7-5, 7-5 victory in Davis Cup play Saturday in Gijón, Spain.
